item.title: 分析师称印尼央行将继续大量购买债券
item.description: 据分析人士称，印尼央行明年将在二级市场上购买多达200万亿印尼盾（120亿美元）的国债，保持快速购买债券的步伐，这有助于缓解外国大量抛售国债所带来的打击。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank will buy as much as 200 trillion rupiah ($12 billion) of government debt in the secondary market next year, according to analysts, keeping up a blistering pace of bond purchases that has helped soften the blow of heavy foreign selling.】

item.title: 白银受空头挤压扩大涨幅，黄金反弹创纪录
item.description: 由于伦敦出现历史性的空头挤压以及中美贸易紧张局势令市场动荡不安，白银在创纪录附近波动，而黄金则创下新高。在其他市场，白宫可能对黄金等贵金属征收关税的担忧推动铂金和钯金大幅走高。【原文：Silver swung near a record as an historic short squeeze in London and US-China trade tensions roiled the market, while gold set a new peak. Elsewhere, fears over potential White House tariffs on gold’s precious metal peers drove platinum and palladium sharply higher.】

item.title: 英国住宅建筑商 Barratt 和 Persimmon 推出自己的 "帮助购买 "计划
item.description: 在对政府刺激房地产市场的努力失去耐心后，英国最大的两家住宅建筑商推出了各自版本的、现已失效的、由国家支持的 "帮助购买 "计划。【原文：Two of the UK’s largest homebuilders have launched their own versions of the now-defunct, state-backed “Help to Buy” program after running out of patience with government efforts to stimulate the housing market.】

item.title: 马来西亚认为林吉特将走强至 1 美元兑 4 林吉特以下的水平
item.description: 马来西亚第二财政部长阿米尔-哈姆扎-阿兹赞（Amir Hamzah Azizan）表示，马来西亚林吉特将延续近期的涨势，因为强劲的国内支出和政府审慎的财政政策缓解了美国关税带来的打击。【原文：The Malaysian ringgit is set to extend its recent gains as strong domestic spending and the government’s fiscal prudence cushion the blow from US tariffs, Second Finance Minister Amir Hamzah Azizan said.】

item.title: 特朗普软化对华言论，美国期货反弹：市场综述
item.description: 在上周五贸易紧张局势急剧升级重创股市之后，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示对与中国达成协议持开放态度，美国期货在亚洲早盘交易中跳涨。【原文：US futures jumped in early Asia trading as President Donald Trump signaled openness to a deal with China after a sharp escalation in trade tensions hammered stocks on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普发出对中国协议持开放态度的信号，美国股指期货上涨
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府在上周华盛顿和北京之间的紧张局势升级后表示对达成贸易协议持开放态度，这表明美国股指在经历了 4 月份以来最严重的暴跌后出现了喘息的迹象。【原文：US stock-index rose, signaling a breather following the worst plunge since April, as US President Donald Trump’s administration signaled openness to a trade deal after tensions between Washington and Beijing escalated last week.】

item.title: 中美贸易紧张局势出现缓和迹象，石油反弹
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府表示对与中国达成协议持开放态度，以平息这两个最大原油消费国之间新的贸易紧张局势之后，原油上涨。【原文：Oil rose after after President Donald Trump’s administration signaled openness to a deal with China to quell fresh trade tensions between the two biggest crude consumers.】

item.title: 人工智能为韩国苦苦挣扎的电影业带来希望与焦虑
item.description: 2020 年，当大流行病关闭了电影制片厂并冻结了电影制作时，许多电影制作人的梦想破灭了。但韩国资深视觉特效师张成浩却找到了意想不到的突破口。他的小工作室 Mofac Studios 一直在努力完成《万王之王》这部改编自狄更斯《我主的一生》的动画片。随后，肯尼斯-布拉纳（Kenneth Branagh）、奥斯卡-艾萨克（Oscar Isaac）和乌玛-瑟曼（Uma Thurman）等好莱坞明星为这部电影献声，这是电影史上的一大转折。【原文：When the pandemic shuttered studios and froze productions in 2020, many filmmakers saw their dreams collapse. But South Korean visual-effects veteran Jang Seong-ho found an unexpected breakthrough. His small studio, Mofac Studios, had been struggling to complete King of Kings, an animated adaptation of Charles Dickens’ The Life of Our Lord. Then, in a twist worthy of cinema, Hollywood stars including Kenneth Branagh, Oscar Isaac, and Uma Thurman lent their voices to the film.】

item.title: 腾讯《三角洲部队》的成功将重点转向射击游戏
item.description: 十多年来，腾讯控股有限公司的开发者姚明（Leo Yao）一直默默无闻地开发着一款又一款射击游戏。后来，他凭借《三角洲部队》（Delta Force）成为 2024 年中国最热门的游戏之一，这款游戏每天仍吸引着 3000 万玩家。【原文：For more than a decade, Tencent Holdings Ltd. developer Leo Yao toiled in relative anonymity, churning out one shooting game after another. Then he scored one of the biggest Chinese hits of 2024 with Delta Force, a game that continues to attract 30 million players daily.】

item.title: 奔富生产商财政部因中国和美国的不确定性而取消 2026 年指导目标
item.description: 由于两个主要市场的前景不明朗，澳大利亚葡萄酒生产商Treasury Wine Estates Ltd.取消了2026财年的盈利指导，并将暂停计划中的股票回购。【原文：Australian vintner Treasury Wine Estates Ltd. scrapped its earnings guidance for the 2026 financial year and will pause a planned share buy-back due to uncertain outlooks in two of its major markets.】

item.title: 从 Tricolor 到 Saks，债券正以极快的速度崩溃
item.description:
近期债券和贷款市场的崩溃令投资者惶惶不安，并引发了对投资组合中隐藏风险的追寻。【原文：

Recent meltdowns in the bond and loan markets have investors on edge, sparking a hunt for hidden risks inside portfolios.

】

item.title: 英国大臣在间谍风波中批评斯塔默的对华政策
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）正受到其政府高级成员的敦促，要求他重新评估对华政策，并在一起间谍案败露后对中国给英国国家安全带来的风险采取更强硬的立场。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer is being urged by senior members of his government to reassess his policy toward China and take a tougher stance on the risks it poses to UK national security in the wake of a collapsed espionage case.】

item.title: 印尼考虑将巴厘岛打造成地区金融中心
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印尼正计划在旅游热点巴厘岛建立一个金融中心，通过吸引国际银行、资产管理公司和私募股权公司来提振其落后的经济。【原文：Indonesia is planning to create a financial hub in tourist hotspot Bali as it seeks to boost its lagging economy by attracting international banks, asset managers and private equity firms, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 经济前景稳定，新加坡将维持货币政策不变
item.description: 新加坡央行预计本周将维持货币政策不变，因为它要权衡通胀低迷、美国贸易措施的威胁挥之不去以及国内经济增长前景的弹性。【原文：Singapore’s central bank is expected to leave monetary policy unchanged this week as it weighs subdued inflation and the lingering threat of US trade measures against a resilient domestic growth outlook.】

item.title: 马克龙任命法国内阁以平息危机
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）周日宣布了新内阁部长人选，因为他和他重新任命的总理塞巴斯蒂安-勒科努（Sebastien Lecornu）组建职能政府以防止法国日益严重的政治危机的压力正在增加。【原文：President Emmanuel Macron announced new cabinet ministers Sunday as pressure builds for him and his reappointed prime minister, Sebastien Lecornu, to form a functional government to forestall France’s growing political crisis.】

item.title: Binance 称模块在加密货币大跌中出现故障
item.description: Binance表示，由于10月10日加密货币价格暴跌，一些平台模块出现了短暂的技术故障，某些资产也出现了脱钩问题。【原文：Binance says that some platform modules briefly experienced technical glitches, and certain assets had de-pegging issues due to sharp market fluctuations as crypto prices tumbled Oct. 10.】

item.title: 停摆继续，债券交易员等待鲍威尔和关税消息
item.description: 面对寥寥无几的经济日历，债券投资者将重点关注包括美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）在费城 NABE 年会上发表的主题演讲在内的演讲嘉宾，以及关税方面可能出现的进一步消息。【原文：Bond investors facing a scant economic calendar will focus on speakers, including Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell in a keynote speech at the NABE annual meeting in Philadelphia, and potential further news on tariffs.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称五角大楼欲购买 10 亿美元关键矿产
item.description: 英国《金融时报》援引五角大楼国防后勤局最近几个月公布的公开文件报道称，五角大楼正在寻求购买多达 10 亿美元的关键矿产进行储备。【原文：The Pentagon is looking to buy as much as $1 billion of critical minerals to stockpile, the Financial Times reported, citing public filings published in recent months by the Pentagon’s Defense Logistics Agency.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州的水危机威胁着埃克森、科赫等公司蓬勃发展的工业热土
item.description: 得克萨斯州南部的水资源短缺正在给这个快速发展的工业中心带来重大风险，而这个工业中心对于唐纳德-特朗普总统主导全球能源市场和削减贸易赤字的双重目标至关重要。【原文：Water shortages in South Texas are posing major risks to a fast-growing industrial hub that’s crucial to President Donald Trump’s twin goals of dominating global energy markets and slashing trade deficits.】

item.title: 万斯称美国在不断升级的中国贸易争端中握有更多牌面
item.description: 美国副总统万斯（JD Vance）呼吁中国政府在中美之间最近不断升级的贸易斗争中 "选择理性之路"，并声称美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）拥有更多的筹码。【原文：Vice President JD Vance called on Beijing to “choose the path of reason” in the latest spiraling trade fight between the US and China, claiming that President Donald Trump has more leverage.】

item.title: PKO 银行考虑向散户投资者出售更多担保债券
item.description: 波兰最大的贷款机构 PKO Bank Polski SA 在首次发行担保债券筹集到 11.6 亿兹罗提（3.15 亿美元）后，正在考虑向个人投资者出售更多担保债券。【原文：PKO Bank Polski SA, Poland’s largest lender, is weighing the sale of more covered bonds to individual investors after it raised 1.16 billion zloty ($315 million) from its maiden issuance.】

item.title: 特朗普的中国威胁为铜牛市的 LME 周派对蒙上阴影
item.description: 随着铜价屡创新高，交易商们上周末在伦敦参加了金属行业最大的一次聚会，情绪高涨。【原文：With copper prices racing towards record highs, traders were in a bullish mood late last week as they descended on London for the largest gathering in the metals calendar.】

item.title: 期权专家迎来 2022 年以来最疯狂的盈利季节之一
item.description: 投资者再次为财报日的股票大涨做准备，在创下历史新高后摇摇欲坠的市场中斥资投机。【原文：Investors are once again preparing for big earnings-day stock moves, paying up to speculate in a market that’s faltering after it reached a record high.】

item.title: 美国加征关税，瑞士与中国将加速贸易谈判
item.description: 瑞士正在寻求与中国在贸易方面进行更紧密的合作，瑞士与美国政府的谈判仍在继续，试图将关税税率从创纪录的水平降低。【原文：The Swiss are seeking closer collaboration on trade with China as Switzerland’s talks with the US administration continue in an attempt to lower tariff rates from a record level.】

item.title: 普京在罢工中放宽对炼油厂的燃油补贴规定
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）放宽了对本国炼油企业的燃料补贴规定，允许它们在乌克兰加强对炼油行业的攻击之际继续获得数十亿卢布的援助。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin relaxed the rules on fuel subsidies to the nation’s refiners, allowing them to continue receiving billions of rubles in aid amid intensified Ukrainian attacks on the industry.】

item.title: 牛市三周年，必须有更多股票加入才能维持下去
item.description: 本周日将迎来美股牛市三周年纪念日，但如果以历史为鉴，牛市需要尽快扩大范围才能继续运行。【原文：The bull market in US stocks is having its third anniversary on Sunday, but if history is any guide it needs to broaden out soon to keep running.】

item.title: 新兴市场动态：企业危机令交易员恐慌（播客）
item.description: 玛丽亚-埃莱娜-维斯凯诺（Maria Elena Vizcaino）在纽约与宋子嘉一起讨论从圣保罗到伊斯坦布尔的企业爆炸事件如何震撼新兴市场公司债的投资者，以及这种情况是否会蔓延到其他资产类别。【原文：Maria Elena Vizcaino joins Zijia Song in New York to discuss how corporate blowups from Sao Paulo to Istanbul are rattling investors of emerging markets company debt and whether it’ll spread to the rest of the asset class.】

item.title: 企业爆炸事件令新兴市场投资者惶恐不安
item.description: 从圣保罗到伊斯坦布尔，公司债券的溃败正向投资者发出信号，新兴市场的一枝独秀可能开始出现一些裂痕。【原文：Corporate bond routs from Sao Paulo to Istanbul are signaling to investors that the standout run in emerging markets may be starting to show some cracks.】

item.title: 世界经济面临关税、人工智能泡沫和债务飙升的三重风险
item.description: 由于美国消费者继续消费，企业消化了更高的成本，而人工智能的蓬勃发展又激发了新的动物精神，世界经济迄今已经受住了美国自 20 世纪 30 年代以来最大规模关税的冲击。【原文：The world economy has so far withstood the biggest barrage of US tariffs since the 1930s as American consumers continued to spend, companies absorbed higher costs and an AI boom fueled a new breed of animal spirits.】

item.title: 苹果从 "Vision Air "耳机到类似元智能眼镜的转型内幕
item.description: 在与 Meta 的新型嵌入式显示屏智能眼镜相处了一周之后，我确信苹果从所谓的 Vision Air 转向眼镜的决定是正确的。另外：公司开始调整高管团队，最新产品发布在即。【原文：After spending a week with Meta’s new display-embedded smart glasses, I’m convinced that Apple made the right call pivoting from the so-called Vision Air to spectacles. Also: The company begins reshuffling its executive team, and its latest product launch is imminent.】
